short_summary: Request for Proposal for Bicycle Shelter
description: Structures and Building and Construction and Manufacturing Components and Supplies
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
================================

### Tender Details

** Tender Reference **: WS4372501006-Doc4445701623
** Tender Title **: Construction of a Bicycle Shelter
** Amendment Number **: 2

### Tender Closes

The tender closes on **April 9, 2024, at 14:00:00**.

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the construction of a bicycle shelter, located in a specified region of British Columbia. The proposed bicycle shelter must meet the requirements outlined in the [ Supplementary Information ](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18849664?extsite=MTg4NDk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Key Details

* **UNSPSC Code**: 30000000 (Structures and Building and Construction and Manufacturing Components and Supplies)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this tender are based on the **Lowest Price** submission.

### Certified Contact

For any information and clarification inquiries, please contact Christine Cress at christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Closing Date Reminder

Please ensure to submit your bid by the closing date to avoid any issues. The link to the tender information can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18849664?extsite=MTg4NDk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18849664?extsite=MTg4NDk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  # Government Tender Announcement # Construction of a Bicycle Shelter # Tender Details # Tender Closes # Tender Description # Key Details # Tender Evaluation Criteria # Certified Contact
